title: Vegetarian Pasta Bake
ingredients: ['450g spaghetti', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '3 onions, chopped', '1 tablespoon tomato puree', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '4 tomatoes, juiced', '250ml water', '4 tablespoons tomato ketchup', '1 pinch salt', '225g grated mozzarella cheese, divided', '100g black olives', '1 green pepper, sliced in rings']
